question:
Which of the following is/ are correct statements about the Mahila Police Volunteers (MPV) initiative?
  1. It was originally conceived by the Union Ministry of Women & Child Development
  2. Haryana is the first state to adopt the initiative
  3. The government of India plans two Mahila Police Volunteers is envisaged per Gram Panchayat across the country
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: MPV scheme was originally conceived by the Union Ministry of Women & Child Development. It is a joint initiative with the Union Ministry of Home Affairs. Haryana is the first state to adopt the initiative at Karnal and Mahindergarh District on a pilot basis under Nirbhaya Fund during the financial year 2016-2017.
